Name: Sopwith VR
About the game: Shoot down triplanes and attack tanks with your Sopwith biplane. Simple World War One flight combat simulator with touch controls, airfoil physics, computer-controlled opponents, and destructible environments, inspired by David L. Clark's classic DOS game from 1984.
Meta Title: Sopwith VR: Dec 26, 2018, David Mohr Gould and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sopwith VR? Check out the release date (Dec 26, 2018), developer insights from David Mohr Gould, and a complete game summary.
